name: DeMarino v. Baltimore and Ohio Railroad Company, Appellant

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, 'Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Hughes, JJ.
parties: DeMarino v. Baltimore and Ohio Railroad Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below in the above-entitled case is affirmed on the opinion of Judge McNaugher; costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Vincent M. Casey, of Margiotti, Pugliese & Casey, for appellant.
J. Thomas Hoffman, with him David 8. Palhovits, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
DeMarino v. Baltimore and Ohio Railroad Company, Appellant.
Argued March 24,1944.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, 'Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Hughes, JJ.
reargument refused May 25, 1944.
Vincent M. Casey, of Margiotti, Pugliese & Casey, for appellant.
J. Thomas Hoffman, with him David 8. Palhovits, for appellee.
April 11, 1944:
